info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Gusty winds and blowing dust will impact portions of south central Grant, northwestern Luna and northeastern Hidalgo Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated showers and thunderstorms along with an outflow boundary. This activity extends from 11 miles south of Faywood to 8 miles northwest of Gage to 11 miles east of Lordsburg. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph with blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will lower visibility and make for hazardous travel, particularly on Interstate 10. Locations impacted include... Gage and Separ. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 34 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
